name: Modular Assault Robot Commando
description:
MARC was made in 2018 by a small group of students at the University of Utah.

"Science projects never go as planned, and Robo Rob’s latest project, the Modular Assault Robot Commando (MARC), is on the loose and is causing havoc within Rob’s robot army the day before his presentation to the board of directors!

Play as MARC as he navigates wild and dangerous war simulation spaces to escape Robo Rob and the insidious board of directors. Luckily, MARC has the ability to switch his parts out in mid-combat. One moment dashing around the battlefield atop jet-thrusters firing laser cannons, and the next slapping enemies into oblivion with oversized hands while barreling through them atop tank treads. Robo Rob’s creations are as dangerous as they are ridiculous and MARC will need to master them all if he ever hopes to escape!"

Garrett Evans - 3D Modeling, Animation

Gary Hansen - Programming, Animation, Level Design, Technical Art

Twitter, ArtStation

Scott Mattes - Game Design, Level Design

Twitter, ArtStation

Parker McAdams - 3D Modeling

Sri Radhakrishnan - Sound Design, UI

Sam Vasquez - 3D Modeling, Texturing
